short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Launches Dreamland Story straight from your browser toolbar. Play whenever you want!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to launch Dreamland Story game (web version) straight from your browser toolbar. You can achieve the best result when you pin an icon of the extension to your browser toolbar.
